API Reference#

Complete API documentation for all TyxonQ modules and components.

Contents

  • Overview

  • Quick Navigation

    • Core Components

    • Applications

    • Libraries

    • Cloud & Integration

Overview#

This section provides detailed API reference for:

üï∏Ô∏è Core - Circuits, Hamiltonians, and quantum operations ‚öôÔ∏è Compiler - Circuit optimization and transformation üíª Devices - Hardware and simulator interfaces üß™ Applications - Quantum chemistry and domain-specific tools üì¶ Libraries - Reusable components and utilities ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud - Cloud platform integration

Quick Navigation#

Core Components#

  • Core API - Quantum circuits and operators

  • Compiler API - Circuit compilation and optimization

  • Devices API - Device management and execution

  • Numerics API - Numerical backends (NumPy, PyTorch)

  • Postprocessing API - Result analysis and processing

Applications#

  • Applications API - Quantum chemistry and VQE algorithms

Libraries#

  • Libs API - Quantum gates, optimizers, and utilities

Cloud & Integration#

  • Cloud API - Cloud API and task management

  • Utils API - Helper functions and utilities
